memory

Interface IStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOperationTrail, IStoredBoolCopy, IStoredBoolTrail, IStoredDoubleCopy, IStoredDoubleTrail, IStoredIntCopy, IStoredIntTrail, IStoredLongCopy, IStoredLongTrail, ITrailStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperationChunckTrail, OperationTrail, StoredBoolChunckTrail, StoredBoolCopy, StoredBoolTrail, StoredDoubleChunckTrail, StoredDoubleCopy, StoredDoubleTrail, StoredDoubleVectorCopy, StoredDoubleVectorTrail, StoredIntChunckTrail, StoredIntCopy, StoredIntTrail, StoredIntVectorCopy, StoredIntVectorTrail, StoredLongChunckTrail, StoredLongCopy, StoredLongTrail, StoredObjectCopy, StoredOperationCopy, UnsafeBoolTrail, UnsafeDoubleTrail, UnsafeIntTrail, UnsafeLongTrail

    public interface IStorage
extends Serializable
    An interface for classes implementing trails of modifications to objects.

    Toutes les classes doivent implementer les fonctions de l'interface pour permettre a l'environnement de deleguer la gestion des mondes pour chaque type de donnee.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void worldCommit(int worldIndex)
      Comitting the current world: merging it with the previous one.
      void worldPop(int worldIndex)
      Moving down to the previous world.
      void worldPush(int worldIndex)
      Moving up to the next world.

    • Method Detail

      • worldPush

        void worldPush(int worldIndex)
        Moving up to the next world.

        Cette methode doit garder l'etat de la variable avant la modification de sorte a la remettre en etat le cas echeant.

        Parameters:
        worldIndex -

      • worldPop

        void worldPop(int worldIndex)
        Moving down to the previous world.

        Cette methode reattribute a la variable ou l'element d'un tableau sa valeur precedente.

        Parameters:
        worldIndex -

      • worldCommit

        void worldCommit(int worldIndex)
        Comitting the current world: merging it with the previous one.

        Not used yet.
